Class CupOfCoffee

  • java.lang.Object
    • CupOfCoffee
  • public class CupOfCoffee
extends java.lang.Object
    Class CupOfCoffee will be used to intialize all required data fields and arrays, those being coffeeType,ounces,temperature, TOO_COLD, TOO_HOT, and validCoffieeTypes[]. It will have the option for the user to be prompted to select a desired coffee type from a list which then will accept input to be validated using set methods and programmer defined exceptions to ensre input falls within acceptable parameters.
    Version:
    10/25/21
    Author:
    Kian R Frawley

    • Constructor Detail

      • CupOfCoffee

        public CupOfCoffee()
            throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException,
                   NotPositiveNumberException,
                   TooColdException,
                   TooHotException
        No-arg constructor for CupOfCoffee.
        Throws:
        TooColdException - If temp is less then 150.
        TooHotException - If temp is greater then 185.
        NotPositiveNumberException - if ounces is less then or equal to 0.
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the selected coffee type does not exist.

      • CupOfCoffee

        public CupOfCoffee​(int coffeeType,
                   int ounces,
                   int temperature)
            throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException,
                   NotPositiveNumberException,
                   TooHotException,
                   TooColdException
        Constructor for class CupOfCoffee, this will pass data fields to set methods for validation.
        Parameters:
        coffeeType - The user selected int that correlates to one of the string coffee types.
        ounces - Selected ounces of Coffee.
        temperature - Selected temperature for Coffee.
        Throws:
        TooColdException - If temp is less then 150.
        TooHotException - If temp is greater then 185.
        NotPositiveNumberException - if ounces is less then or equal to 0.
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the selected coffee type does not exist.

      • setOunces

        public void setOunces​(int ounces)
               throws NotPositiveNumberException
        Set method for data field ounces. Validates the data field is a positive number.
        Parameters:
        ounces - Selected ounces of Coffee.
        Throws:
        NotPositiveNumberException - if passed an int less or equal to zero.

      • setTemperature

        public void setTemperature​(int temperature)
                    throws TooColdException,
                           TooHotException
        Set method for data field temperature. Validates that temperature falls between an acceptable interval by compairng the temperature to static data fields TOO_COLD and TOO_HOT. Will throw an exception if this test is failed.
        Parameters:
        temperature - Selected temperature for coffee.
        Throws:
        TooColdException - If temp is less then 150.
        TooHotException - If temp is greater then 185.

      • getValidCoffeeTypes

        public static java.lang.String getValidCoffeeTypes()
        Static get method for elements of array validCoffeeTypes. Returns a numbered list of each element to assist users in selecting their coffee.
        Returns:
        Numbered menu containing different kinds of coffee.
